page.title: 19Wivelsfield - Local History
page.content:
The Wivelsfield area comprises three parts -the village of{Wivelsfield {Green,}the area of Burgess Hill known as{World's End}and the{Southern part {of Haywards Heath.}The village is divided by the B2112, the oldest part being to the west of the road. After the Black Death struck, a new settlement was built a mile or so away from the original.
There remain a few old cottages clustered around the church in the old part, one of which was used at one time as a post office and stores.
There is an interesting 16th century {moated farmhouse}to the east of the main road.
Wivelsfield is reputed to be the{most {haunted parish in Sussex !
